get.summary: Get file transfer defaults for a role

put.summary: Update file transfer defaults for a role

get.summary: Get file transfer permissions for a target-role assignment

put.summary: Update file transfer permissions for a target-role assignment

get.summary: Get all role assignments for a user with expiry information
Get a single user role assignment with details

post.summary: Add a role to a user with optional expiry

delete.summary: Remove a role from a user (soft delete - sets revoked_at)

put.summary: Update expiry for a user role assignment

delete.summary: Remove expiry from a user role assignment (make permanent)

get.summary: Get history for a specific user role assignment
Get all role history for a user

AddUserRoleRequest.title: AddUserRoleRequest
AddUserRoleRequest.description: Request to add a user role with optional expiry

FileTransferPermissionData.title: FileTransferPermissionData
FileTransferPermissionData.description: Request/response for file transfer permissions with inheritance support

allow_file_upload.description: Allow file uploads via SCP/SFTP (null = inherit from role)

allow_file_download.description: Allow file downloads via SCP/SFTP (null = inherit from role)

blocked_extensions.description: Blocked file extensions (null = inherit from role)

max_file_size.description: Maximum file size in bytes (null = inherit from role)

file_transfer_hash_threshold_bytes.description: Hash threshold for file transfers in bytes (files larger than this won't be hashed)
Hash threshold for file transfers in bytes (files larger than this won't be hashed)

allow_file_upload.description: Allow file uploads by default for targets with this role

allow_file_download.description: Allow file downloads by default for targets with this role

allowed_paths.description: Default allowed paths (list of path patterns, null = all paths allowed)

blocked_extensions.description: Default blocked file extensions (list, null = no extensions blocked)

max_file_size.description: Default maximum file size in bytes (null = no limit)

RoleFileTransferDefaults.title: RoleFileTransferDefaults
RoleFileTransferDefaults.description: Request/response for role file transfer defaults

allow_file_upload.description: Allow file uploads by default for targets with this role

allow_file_download.description: Allow file downloads by default for targets with this role

allowed_paths.description: Default allowed paths (null = all paths allowed)

blocked_extensions.description: Default blocked file extensions (null = no extensions blocked)

max_file_size.description: Default maximum file size in bytes (null = no limit)

UpdateUserRoleExpiryRequest.title: UpdateUserRoleExpiryRequest
UpdateUserRoleExpiryRequest.description: Request to update user role expiry

expires_at.description: The new expiry timestamp, or null to remove expiry (make permanent)

UserRoleAssignmentResponse.title: UserRoleAssignmentResponse
UserRoleAssignmentResponse.description: Response containing user role assignment with expiry info

UserRoleHistoryDetails.title: UserRoleHistoryDetails
UserRoleHistoryDetails.description: History entry details stored in the details JSON column

UserRoleHistoryEntry.title: UserRoleHistoryEntry
UserRoleHistoryEntry.description: Response entry for user role history
